result.execSummary:
The defendant Nicholas O Archambault was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Theft-Movable Property <=$2500 [Modifiers: Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
If revoked:
Defendant IS eligible for Challenge Incarceration Program.
Defendant IS NOT eligible for Substance Abuse Program.
Consecutive to: present sentence, if revoked.
The Conditions for Extended Supervision apply as to Conditions for Probation if revoked.

miscConds.notes:
Restitution (payable to the victim) is to be paid as a Condition of Probation and to be paid BEFORE costs/fines.

  If Probation/Extended Supervision is revoked and/or a prison term ordered, outstanding financial obligations shall be collected pursuant to statutory provisions, including deductions from inmate prison monies.  If discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and government entities for outstanding financial obligations.  Collections may include income assignment.
Court costs are to be paid as a Condition of Probation.
Maintain employment and or combination of schooling.

Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent.
No contact with the victim or her residence.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

ADDRESS INFO for Nicholas O Archambault
Current: PO BOX 200, Fox Lake Correctional, Fox Lake, WI 53933 United States  (Effective: 10-10-2017)
Prior: 515 West Moreland Blvd, C/O Waukesha County Jail, Waukesha, WI 53188 United States
filed by the state
with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Nicholas O Archambault in court, in custody, with Attorney Joseph James Dorlack.  District Attorney's Office Law Intern Natalie Schiferl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State files an amended information.  Defendant enters a no contest plea to Count #1 on amended information.  Court performs plea colloquy and finds Defendant guilty of Count #1 on amended information.  State gives sentencing recommendations.  Attorney Dorlack makes statement regarding sentencing.  Defendant makes statements.  Court sentences the Defendant to the following:

COUNT #1:  IMPOSED AND STAYED SENTENCE OF:   

2  YEARS IMPRISONMENT        **consecutive to present sentence**
  -  1 YEAR OF INITIAL CONFINEMENT
  -  1 YEAR OF EXTENDED SUPERVISON 

TERM OF PROBATION:  1 YEAR    **consecutive to present sentence**

CONDITIONS OF PROBATON:  
____Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent;
____Maintain employment and/or combination of schooling 
____No contact with: victim or her residence 

RESTITUTION:  $189.85 to victim (to be paid as a condition of probation - restitution to be paid before costs or fines)

COSTS:  $253.00 (to be paid as a condition of probation)

Defendant is eligible for the Challenge Incarceration Program.
Defendant is not eligible for the Substance Abuse Program.
